title: UpdateBulkUpload
description: an event used to indicate that the data for a given EPG channel has been updated with relevant updates

bulkUploadId.description: the id of the bulk upload containing the file that was uploaded for the ingest process

setStatusToFatal.description: if true then bulkUpload is in fatal failure and should override any other status, in case there are no other successes, in which case it will be set to partial
